bill.summary: 10/27/2000--Reported to House amended. Coal Accountability and Retired Employee Act for the 21st Century - Mandates that interest credited to the Abandoned Mine Reclamation Fund for fiscal years 1992 through 1995, and which has not been transferred to the United Mine Workers of America Combined Fund before enactment of this Act, shall be transferred to such Combined Fund to pay the amount of any shortfall in any premium account for any plan year under the Combined Fund.Designates such entire amount as an emergency requirement (not subject to pay-as-you-go procedures) pursuant to the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985 (Gramm-Rudman-Hollings Act).
